overview:
Randy is a serial entrepreneur, avid inventor and visionary entrepreneur who has founded five of his own startups, beRelevant, Blindfish, ObjectiveMinds, Medcom, and Interdac.

Randy is a 20-year veteran of Silicon Valley where he’s held Senior and Executive Management positions including Director of Marketing at Basho Technologies, CEO of beRelevant, VP of Engineering at Match.com, VP of Marketing at Blindfish, Director of Marketing at Satmetrix, VP of Engineering and Operations at ReleaseNow.com, and CTO and VP of Engineering at OneChannel.net. In addition to Senior Management positions at Sun Microsystems and First Pacific Networks Mr. Hamilton was a Venture Partner at Outlook Ventures.
